name: The Place They Call Home
description:
A short game by LUCRA

Music - 8 bit Eskas

Art - LUCRA

Code - LUCRA

Sorry if there isn't that much. 

The number of events used in the Construct Engine 

was running out,  and I had to put out something.

(FYI: there is a mistake in which if you pick the "I survived" ending, the music doesn't stop, and instead intertwines with the pyschotic laughter, thus creating a garbled mess)
